amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Federal Drug Control Programs to support a national youth and anti-drug media campaign.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for Federal Drug Control Programs by $25 million and to reduce funding for the GSA by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 151 (Roll no. 344).
